jeopardy_round: OH, WHAT A TANGLED WEBSITE WE WEAVE

(1, 1).clue: The Chinese Communist First Front Army staged the 6,000-mile retreat known as the Long March under this leader

(2, 1).clue: Hal-oh!  Heidi Klum was born on June 1, 1973 in this country

(4, 1).clue: The 2 clickable buttons on the front page of this site are "Search" & "I'm Feeling Lucky"; well, do ya, punk?
